title: Drawing, "Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975
medium: Gray marker on white tracing paper
description: Four-pointed star shape with flat points running perpendicular to its axes. Form created by four 6-sided closed shapes that, combined radially, create illusion of folded ribbon. Ribbon form contains small section of negative space at center in shape of four-pointed star.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Gray marker on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-14.
